phrases: There is no way she would be...
She did not have her parasol.
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
Fly high, high into the sky,
Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Nishizono-san has not come to school these last few days.
No one even talks about her absence.
It is almost like she never existed in the first place.
I was wondering how Nishizono-san's doing.
I sent her a few texts, but she has not replied.
Maybe she is still feeling unwell?
Seriously, we cannot practice in this rain.
She is the Little Busters' manager!
I could not explain it, but something was off.
It felt like the world itself was dreaming.
Like Nishizono-san's existence was slowly fading.
Everyone had begun to forget that she existed.
I thought about going to visit you,
but it is hard for me to get into the girls' dorm.
You would come to see me?
Did you want to see me sleeping that badly?
You wanted to force yourself on me while I was sick.
No, I had no intention of...
I was pretty worried about you.
I had this feeling you might suddenly disappear.
If I were to disappear from this world,
everyone would forget that I once lived.
I would not remain in anyone's memories.
Me feeding the birds under the tree...
Me reading my favorite book so much that it is all worn out...
It will all disappear as though it was an illusion.
I am sure you have noticed, Naoe-san.
These last few days, everyone has been forgetting about me.
You must have felt that something might happen.
What exactly is going to happen?
Could you hold on to this for me?
But you said this book was you yourself.
You would give me something so valuable?
You can forget about me if you would like.
But do not forget this poem.
That way, I might be able to believe there is a reason why someone as insignificant as me was born.
I am going to where the end begins.
If you would not mind, could you accompany me there?
Can you feel the sound of the waves making you calm and sleepy?
Is this where the end begins?
Could you tell me about the Little Busters?
I was physically weak when I was a kid.
I had narcolepsy, and there was also the shock of losing my parents.
But every time I felt down, they would all come to see me.
We would step on each other's shadows, kick stones,
Masato, Kengo, Rin, and I could never find any.
It is the reason I can be who I am now.
Those must be very warm memories.
I planned on coming here sooner.
But you talked to me, and I met all the Little Busters.
If only I could live my life with your circle of friends...
Thoughts like that grew ever so slightly in my heart.
What is about to happen here cannot be changed.
It is something I have wished for since long, long ago.
Does not a white bird feel within her heart forlorn?
The blue of the sky, the blue of the sea; neither stains her.
I have wanted to become a white bird.
Like a white bird untainted with the blue of the sky or the sea,
alone, proud, beautiful, and connected to nobody else.
That is what I had thought.
We have already met twice, right Riki-kun?
First in town, and then during the storm.
How long has it been, Midori?
Let me stay here just a little longer.
How long are you going to keep holding onto that parasol?
Are you that afraid of letting Riki-kun know?
It is no use, you know.
Now you know exactly why Mio always has her parasol open.
What time do you think it is?
It is the middle of the night.
They found you by the sea and brought you back.
When I heard that they had to carry you back, I thought you were done for.
Well, you look fine, at least.
Why did I go to the sea?
Well, sleep for the rest of the night.
I am sure you will feel much better once you wake up.
The peaceful, unchanging days continued to pass.
Is that all you talk about?
Wait, what do you mean by all?
Y'know, my muscles talked to me recently.
Nothing, I just thought it might feel pretty good to read a book under that tree on such a fine morning.
Quick, the bell will ring soon!
Stains her; between them she floats.
Masato, what happened to Nishizono-san after that?
I got the same one as you!
Masato, I am going to ask a weird question.
Do you think that is Nishizono-san?
Yeah, that is a weird question.
Nishizono Mio, the girl who recently became the Little Busters' manager.
Nishizono-san's supposed to be really quiet.
I do not really get it, but she does not seem any different to me.
Yeah, she is always been really active.
Everyone other than me thinks that Midori is Nishizono-san.
What the hell are you doing?!
I was just taking the food on your plate.
But that is mine, damn it!
I did not know what to do.
Hey, want to go check out that shop?
Am I the one who is mistaken here?
Was Nishizono-san like this from the start?
This book belongs to the girl who fed the birds under this tree.
So you are the only one who can tell me and Mio apart.
I guess this means you still remember Mio.
But everyone else calls me Mio.
So it would be nice if you called me that too.
Because if I call you Mio, I will forget about the other Nishizono-san.
What did you do to her?!
You are making it sound like I am at fault here.
I was waiting for you to ask.
Who do you think I am?
Though that is not entirely correct.
You see, I do not have a shadow either.
But Mio cared way too much about it.
People do not normally stare at your feet, you know?
But she always has her parasol open and gets nervous.
And in the end, everyone is going to forget about her.
You say that now, but you will forget about Mio soon as well.
But you have forgotten her already.
You would not have remembered her without this.
I do not need to do this.
A little more time, and you will...
You are desperately trying to hold on to your memories.
But it is only a matter of time.
Your memory of Mio is slowly disappearing.
It is getting more and more difficult to remember her.
Just a little longer, and you will see me as Mio too.
The sound of the bell echoing,
The sound of the bell echoing,
Those pieces we shared, one each
Those pieces we shared, one each
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
Can we go beyond the stars?
Can we go beyond the stars?
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
You will be able to smile after you cry,
You will be able to smile after you cry,
I said that because I know you can
I said that because I know you can
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
And I will not say good-bye
And I will not say good-bye
You will start walking again one day
You will start walking again one day
But if I forget her too, she will really disappear.
